name: Starfaller
description:
Cosmic, risk- and reward filled auto-falling -type mobile game Starfaller was developed in the Pocket Game Jam #3 in Finland, September 2018.

You can move your falling star to left or right, as you travel across the skies and earth. Use your controls to collect precious elementals and avoid the dangerous ones, or your fall will be short!

The theme was “Chain reaction”

TEAM

Sofia Rinskoi - designer, producer, writer, character / interactive art

Laura-Maaria Penttilä - designer, UI & usability design and art, sound effects

Kehan (Ken) Chen - designer, background art

Teemu Kokkonen - designer, developer

Elie Abraham - music design
